title: Hyperbaric Therapy and Healing From Deep Chemical Peel

operands.value: The study will include 40 post-deep peel women (exoderm)
treated by the same dermatologist (dr. Landau)
The treatment group will receive 5 consecutive daily hyperbaric treatments, 1 hour long each, at 2 ATF, starting from day 7 to peel
Prior to treatment, each patient will be signed on informed consent
Prior to treatment, each patient will have a complete physical examination
The control group will be matched by the following parameters: age, skin color and type, and indication for peeling
The control group will be picked up by the dermatologist
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Must be FEMALE'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 80 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Prior to treatment, each patient will be signed on informed consent'), Symbol('Prior to treatment, each patient will have a complete physical examination'), Symbol('The control group will be matched by the following parameters: age, skin color and type, and indication for peeling'), Symbol('The control group will be picked up by the dermatologist'), Symbol('The study will include 40 post-deep peel women (exoderm)'), Symbol('The treatment group will receive 5 consecutive daily hyperbaric treatments, 1 hour long each, at 2 ATF, starting from day 7 to peel'), Symbol('older than 18 years old'), Symbol('treated by the same dermatologist (dr. Landau)'), Not(Or(Symbol('have chronic lung disease'), Symbol('have claustrophobia'), Symbol('have known middle ear disease'))))
